com.kontakt.sdk.ble.manager

Class ActionManager.Configuration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.ble.manager.ActionManager.Configuration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ActionManager.Configuration

    public static final class ActionManager.Configuration.Builder
extends Object
    Configuration builder is responsible for creating immutable configuration which acts as a parameters and callbacks supplier and thus describes desired behaviour. By default the Builder is initialized with all default parameters which do not enable any of the functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • setMemoryCacheSize

        public ActionManager.Configuration.Builder setMemoryCacheSize(long memoryCacheSize,
                                                              MemoryUnit memoryUnit)
        The Action Service (ActionService) which collaborates with Action Manager performs http requests thanks to the API Client in order to load previously defined actions for beacons in certain proximities. Once the action is loaded, it is cached in internal memory of the device.The cache is based on LruCache. Depending on the cache size the number of the http requests may be limited or actions may be loaded every time they are desired and unpresent in internal cache. Please note, that it is advisable to provide size which will allow to reduce http requests to the minimum. You can easily specify, how many units and of which type should be reserved for the internal cache. If not set, 0 bytes is reserved for the internal cache.
        Parameters:
        memoryCacheSize - the memory cache size
        memoryUnit - the memory unit
        Returns:
        the Builder instance
        See Also:
        Android SDK documentation - LruCache

      • setActionNotifier

        public ActionManager.Configuration.Builder setActionNotifier(ActionManager.ActionNotifier actionNotifier)
        Sets action notifier (ActionManager.ActionNotifier).
        Parameters:
        actionNotifier - the action notifier
        Returns:
        the Builder instance

      • build

        public ActionManager.Configuration build()

        Returns:
        the configuration instance
